title: Shield of Cthulhu
summaries: The Shield of Cthulhu is a shield accessory that allows the player to perform a dash attack by double-tapping either the ◀ Left or ▶ Right key. Dashing into an enemy deals 30 damage, recoils the player backward, and grants 0.07 seconds of invincibility frames. The Shield of Cthulhu is always dropped from the Eye of Cthulhu's Treasure Bag in Expert Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the player to dash into the enemy
Double tap a direction
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
